about.title: About
about.subtitle: The Best QR Code Generator for High Quality QR Codes
about.description: Personalized QRCode is one of the most popular online qr code generators with millions of already created QR codes. The high resolution of the QR codes and the powerful design options make it one of the best QR code generators on the web that can be used for commercial and print purposes.

lifetime.title: Endless lifetime with unlimited scans
lifetime.description: Personalized QRCode also has no limitations. All generated QR codes will work forever, do not expire and have no scanning limits like you see at other commercial QR code generators. The created QR codes are static so the only limitation is that you can't edit the QR code again.

logo.title: QR Codes with Logo
logo.description: Put a custom brand on your QR code. With Personalized QRCode it is very simple and straightforward to add a logo to your QR Code. The QR codes are still readable. Every QR code can have an error correction up to 30%. This means 30% of the QR code (excluding the corner elements) can be removed and the QR code is still working. We can put a logo image on the QR code that covers up to 30%.

design.title: Custom Design and Colors
design.description: Make your QR code look really unique with our design and color options. You can customize the shape and form of the corner elements and the body of the QR code. You can also set your own colors for all QR code elements. Add a gradient color to the QR code body and make it really stand out. Attractive QR codes can increase the amount of scans.

print.title: High resolution QR Codes for Print
print.description: Personalized QRCode offers print quality QR codes with high resolutions. When creating your QR code set the pixel size to the highest resolution to create .png files in print quality. You can also download vector formats like .svg, .eps, .pdf for best possible quality. We recommend the .svg format because it includes all design settings and gives you the perfect print format that can be used with most vector graphic software.

vector.title: QR Code Vector Formats
vector.description: Most free QR code makers only allow creating QR codes in low resolutions and do not offer vector formats. Use the offered vector formats to print QR Codes in huge resolutions without losing quality. We recommend the .svg format for further editing. The offered .pdf and .eps formats only support classic QR codes without the design and logo options.

commercial.title: Single QR code free/bulk requires membership service
commercial.description: Single QR code generation is free, batch generation requires membership and can be used for any purpose you want. This includes all commercial purposes. Batch generation of QR codes requires membership and can be downloaded as a ZIP file.

cta.title: Ready to Create Your QR Code?

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.subtitle: Create your custom QR Code with Logo

step1.title: Set QR Content
step1.description: Select a content type at the top for your QR code (URL, Text, Email...). After selecting your type you will see all available options. Enter all fields that should appear when scanning your QR code. Make sure everything you enter is correct because you can't change the content once your QR code is printed.

step2.title: Customize Design
step2.description: You want your QR code to look unique? Set a custom color and replace the standard shapes of your QR code. The corner elements and the body can be customized individually. Add a logo to your QR code. Select it from the gallery or upload your own logo image. You can also start with one of the templates from the template gallery.

step3.title: Generate QR Code
step3.description: Set the pixel resolution of your QR code with the slider. Click the "Create QR Code"-button to see your qr code preview. Please make sure your QR code is working correctly by scanning the preview with your QR Code scanner. Use a high resolution setting if you want to get a png code with print quality.

step4.title: Download Image
step4.description: Now you can download the image files for your QR code as .png or .svg, .jpg vector graphic. If you want a vector format with the complete design please choose .svg. SVG is working in software like Adobe Illustrator or Inkscape. The logo and design settings currently only work for .png and .svg files.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are dedicated to providing the best personalized QR code generation service. Our platform makes it easy for anyone to create beautiful, customized QR codes for any purpose.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2024, Personalized QR Code was born from a simple idea: making QR codes beautiful, customizable, and accessible to everyone. We believe that QR codes should not only be functional but also visually appealing, reflecting your brand and personality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make QR code creation accessible, beautiful, and functional for everyone. We aim to democratize QR code generation by providing a user-friendly platform that requires no technical expertise.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading platform for personalized QR code generation worldwide, empowering individuals and businesses to create stunning, branded QR codes that enhance their digital presence.

value1.title: User-Friendly Design
value1.description: We prioritize simplicity and ease of use. Our intuitive interface ensures that anyone can create professional QR codes in minutes.

value2.title: High-Quality Output
value2.description: We use advanced algorithms to ensure every QR code is crisp, scannable, and meets industry standards.

value3.title: Privacy and Security
value3.description: Your data is important to us. We implement strict security measures to protect your information and respect your privacy.

value4.title: Innovation
value4.description: We continuously improve our platform with new features and enhancements based on user feedback.

reason1.title: Easy to Use
reason1.description: No technical skills required. Create professional QR codes in just a few clicks.

reason2.title: Fully Customizable
reason2.description: Upload your logo, choose colors, adjust size, and make your QR code uniquely yours.

reason3.title: Fast & Reliable
reason3.description: Generate high-quality QR codes instantly with our optimized platform.

reason4.title: Free to Start
reason4.description: Create QR codes with our free plan, upgrade when you need more features.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the talented individuals behind Personalized QR Code. We're a diverse group of developers, designers, and innovators passionate about creating the best QR code generation experience.

member1.name: Alex Chen
member1.bio: Visionary leader with 10+ years of experience in software development and digital innovation. Passionate about making technology accessible to everyone.

member2.name: Sarah Johnson
member2.bio: Creative designer specializing in user experience and interface design. Dedicated to creating beautiful and intuitive products.

member3.name: Michael Zhang
member3.bio: Full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. Ensures our platform is fast, reliable, and scalable.

member4.name: Emily Wang
member4.bio: Strategic product manager focused on user needs and business growth. Bridges the gap between technology and customer satisfaction.

scanner.title: QR Code Picture Scanner
scanner.subtitle: Upload an image or use your device camera to decode any QR code instantly.

items: Works with PNG, JPG, WebP and GIF images up to 10 MB.
Live camera mode supports most modern desktop and mobile browsers.
Use the light switch to improve accuracy in low-light environments.

upload.title: Scan from an image
upload.description: Upload a screenshot or photo that contains a QR code.
upload.help: Tip: crop the picture so the QR code fills the frame for best accuracy.
upload.error: We couldn't find a QR code in that file. Try a clearer picture.

camera.title: Live camera scanner
camera.description: Use your camera to scan codes without leaving the page.
camera.permission: Allow camera access if the preview does not appear.
camera.unsupported: Camera access is not supported in this browser.
camera.torchUnavailable: This camera does not support torch control.
camera.readError: We couldn't read a QR code from the video frame. Adjust distance or lighting and try again.

status.title: Scan result
status.empty: No QR code has been scanned yet.
status.historyEmpty: Results will appear here after your first scan.
status.copyError: Copy failed. Please copy the text manually.

help.title: How to use
help.description: Follow these tips for the best decoding accuracy:
steps: Keep the QR code flat, well lit and in focus before scanning.
Upload a high-resolution image or start the camera and align the QR code with the frame.
Use the light switch when scanning at night or in low-light environments.
Once decoded, copy or share the result directly from this page.
If the QR contains a URL, tap it to open in a new tab or press Copy to share.
When scanning from a monitor, reduce brightness or avoid glare for better contrast.

feedback.title: Feedback & Support
